00002 #define __ANSI_COLOR_H__

00004 #include <stdio.h>

00006 namespace AnsiColor{
00007   enum Color{
00008     Black   = 0,
00009     Red     = 1,
00010     Green   = 2,
00011     Yellow  = 3,
00012     Blue    = 4,
00013     Magenta = 5,
00014     Cyan    = 6,
00015     White   = 7,
00016     Default = 9,
00017   };
00018 
00019   static inline void emit(FILE *out,int code) {fprintf(out,"%c[%dm",27,code);}
00020 
00021   static inline void Reset(FILE *out) {emit(out,0);}
00022 
00023   static inline void Bold(FILE *out)      {emit(out,1);}
00024   static inline void Italics(FILE *out)   {emit(out,3);}
00025   static inline void Underline(FILE *out) {emit(out,4);}
00026   static inline void Inverse(FILE *out)   {emit(out,7);}
00027   static inline void Strike(FILE *out)    {emit(out,9);}
00028 
00029   static inline void BoldOff(FILE *out)      {emit(out,22);}
00030   static inline void ItalicsOff(FILE *out)   {emit(out,23);}
00031   static inline void UnderlineOff(FILE *out) {emit(out,24);}
00032   static inline void InverseOff(FILE *out)   {emit(out,27);}
00033   static inline void StrikeOff(FILE *out)    {emit(out,29);}
00034 
00035   static inline void SetFgColor(FILE *out,Color fg) {emit(out,30+fg);}
00036   static inline void SetBgColor(FILE *out,Color bg) {emit(out,40+bg);}
00037   static inline void SetColor(FILE *out,Color fg,Color bg)
00038     {emit(out,30+fg); emit(out,30+bg);}
00039 };
